HomePage.title: Welcome to Seeker
HomePage.description: Find the best professionals for your needs

Hero.subtitle: Connect with qualified professionals across legal, design, finance, marketing, healthcare, and more. Discover nearby experts who can help you achieve your goals.

searchPlaceholders.lawyer: Find a lawyer for business contracts

ServiceCategories.description: From legal advice to creative design, connect with verified professionals across 50+ service categories. Each expert is carefully vetted for quality and expertise.

HowItWorks.subtitle: Getting started is simple. Follow these three easy steps to connect with the perfect professional for your needs.

step1.title: Find the Right Expert
step1.description: Use advanced filters to discover verified professionals in your area.

step2.title: Connect & Communicate
step2.description: Chat, call, or video conference directly with your chosen professional.

step3.title: Get Things Done
step3.description: Track your project, ensure quality, and leave your review after completion.

statsSection.title: Trusted by Thousands
statsSection.subtitle: Join our growing community of satisfied users and professionals

featuredProfessionals.description: Connect with top-rated professionals who have proven track records of success. Each expert is verified and highly recommended by our community.

Testimonials.title: What Our Clients Say
Testimonials.subtitle: Real experiences from real people who found success through Seeker

1.name: Jennifer Martinez
1.text: Found the perfect lawyer for my startup through Seeker. The verification process gave me confidence, and the results exceeded expectations.

2.name: Robert Thompson
2.text: The designer I hired through Seeker completely transformed our brand identity. Professional, creative, and delivered on time.

3.name: Lisa Wang
3.text: Seeker connected me with an amazing financial advisor who helped restructure my business finances. Highly recommend!

Footer.description: Connecting you with trusted professionals across various domains. Find qualified experts for legal, design, finance, marketing, healthcare, and more.
